①光明：“彤管有煒”。[合]煒燁(光耀的樣子。引申爲明白。)

煒字的基本解释

煒
wěi
见“炜”。

煒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》于鬼切，上尾，云。］
“炜1”的繁体字。
色红而有光泽。
[②]［huī］
［《集韻》吁韋切，平微，曉。］
同“煇1”。“炜2”的繁体字。
光；光辉。

煒字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　煒； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页676第14
【唐韻】于鬼切【集韻】【韻會】羽鬼切，?音偉。【說文】盛赤也。【玉篇】明也。亦盛貌。【廣韻】光煒。【詩·邶風】彤管有煒。【傳】煒，赤貌。　又【集韻】吁韋切，音揮。本作煇。詳煇字註。【前漢·王莽傳】靑煒登平。【註】服虔曰：煒音暉。如淳曰：靑氣之光煇也。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　wei; Kangxi strokes: 13; page number: page 676 14
[Tang Yun] Yu Guiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yu Guiqie,? Yinwei. [Said the text] Sheng Chi also. [Jade articles] Ming Ye. Also magnificent. [Guangyun] Guangwei. [Poetry·Bei Feng] Tong Guan has Wei. [Biography] Wei, red appearance.　 [Ji Yun] Call on Wei to cut and wave. This is brilliant. Detailed note of Hui characters. [Previous Han·Wang Mang Biography] Qian Wei Dengping. [Note] Fu Qian said: Wei Yinhui. Such as Chun said: The brilliance of Qi Qi.
